ValidationRule.description: The Type can only be changed on Parent Accounts by a System Administrator.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(ParentId)), ISCHANGED(Type), TEXT(Type) <> TEXT(Parent.Type), OR( $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator', NOT($Permission.Account_Edit_Type_Field) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Type can only be changed on Parent Accounts by a System Administrator.
